Getting Started.question: How do I buy Digital Gold on Groww?
Getting Started.answer:
1. Enter the amount: You can input your desired purchase amount in rupees or grams of gold.

2. Buy in one-click: Review your order to make quick payment within the 5-minute price window.

3. Secured and insured: Your gold locker will be updated, where you can view your purchased Digital Gold holdings.

Getting Started.question: How often does the live price change?
Getting Started.answerHtml: The live price may change throughout the day. However, once you begin a purchase/sell transaction, the live price shown will be locked in for 5 minutes.

Getting Started.question: Is there any minimum order quantity or price to buy bullion?
Getting Started.answerHtml: You can buy Digital Gold on Groww for as low as Rs.10

Getting Started.question: What is the maximum amount I can invest in Digital Gold on Groww?
Getting Started.answer:
For the first order, you can buy gold worth up to Rs 1.7 lakh (including SGST).

For all purchases after that, you can buy gold worth up to Rs 2 crores (including SGST) per order.Â

Getting Started.question: How can I pay for my Digital Gold purchase?
Getting Started.answer: You can pay easily via UPI/Net banking.

Buy Order.question: My gold order failed. When will I get my refund?
Buy Order.answer: You will receive the refund amount in your bank account within 2-7 working days.

Buy Order.question: Can I cancel my Digital Gold purchase?
Buy Order.answerHtml: Once an order has been placed successfully, it cannot be cancelled.

Buy Order.question: Will I get an invoice for a Digital Gold purchase order?
Buy Order.answerHtml: Yes, you will receive an email confirmation with an invoice in the name of Augmont attached on every Digital Gold purchase order.

Buy Order.question: My issue is not listed here.
Buy Order.answer: You can try searching for your issue. Alternatively you can raise a ticket with us. Our Customer Support champs will help you out in no time!
